sentences.en: Agricultural production of sorghum, maize, millet, potato, rich pear, apple.
sentences.cn: 农业主产高粱 、 玉米 、 谷子 、 薯类, 盛产梨 、 苹果.

sentences.en: Agriculture to plant sorghum, maize, millet - based andy ang nai niu.
sentences.cn: 农业以种植高粱 、 玉米 、 谷子为主,兼养奶牛.

sentences.en: Bread of this kind is made from sorghum flour.
sentences.cn: 这种面包是用高粱面做的.

sentences.en: But some plants, including maize and sorghum, have evolved to use a type called C4.
sentences.cn: 但是一些植物，包括玉米和高粱，进化成了使用C4型的光合作用。

sentences.en: Corn, wheat and sorghum are feed grain.
sentences.cn: 谷类 、 麦子及玉蜀黍等都是家畜的饲料.

sentences.en: From the "Red Sorghum", Mo Yan almost never stops his exploration and innovation in the aspects of literary style.
sentences.cn: 从《红高粱》开始，莫言几乎从未停止在文体方面的探索和创新。

sentences.en: In Somalia the monopoly of parastatals in maize, sorghum, and imported foods has been eliminated.
sentences.cn: 在索马里,在玉米 、 高梁以及进口粮食交易方面半国营垄断机构已被取消.

sentences.en: Mo Yan’s novel Red Sorghum first came to wide attention on the big screen both at home and abroad in 1987.
sentences.cn: 莫言的小说《红高粱》于1987被拍摄为同名电影作品并在国内外获得了广泛关注。

sentences.en: T is under a sorghum, insert the dip nib.
sentences.cn: 笔是高粱杆一节, 插入蘸笔尖.

sentences.en: The development of the A 3 cytoplasm in forage sorghum breeding.
sentences.cn: 研究A3细胞质在饲草高粱育种上的利用.

sentences.en: The main crops are wheat, corn, sorghum, beans and so on.
sentences.cn: 主要农作物有小麦 、 玉米 、 高粱 、 豆类等.

sentences.en: The sorghum is in the ear.
They made sorghum into pig feed.
sentences.cn: 他们把高粱做成了猪饲料.

sentences.en: This place is famous for corn, wheat, sorghum and cattle.
sentences.cn: 此地以出产玉米 、 小麦 、 高梁和牲畜出名.

sentences.en: We can grow sorghum or maize on this plot.
sentences.cn: 这块地可以种高粱或玉米.

words.tran_cn: [作物]高粱；蜀黍；甜得发腻的东西

trans.tran_en: a type of grain that is grown in tropical areas
